---
title: "Pre-class survey"
---


1. What is the name we should call you/how should we refer to you?

2. What is your (intended) major?

3. Please explain what you hope to take away from this course.

4. Do my current proposed office hour times work for you? If not, please provide some general availability.

5. Is there anything else I should know that might help you succeed in this course?
